name: u2i
tagline: u2i - Arduino-based USB/serial <-> I2C, SMBus Bridge
body:
### Welcome to u2i
Simple Arduino-based USB/serial to I2C/SMBus bridge.

### Supported Arduino platforms
1. [Arduino Micro](http://arduino.cc/en/Main/arduinoBoardMicro)
2. [Arduino Leonardo](http://arduino.cc/en/Main/ArduinoBoardLeonardo)

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

### Support or Contact
Contact KR (@kr64)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
